webwork-tex.statement:
\leavevmode\\\relax
Find the unit tangent vector at the indicated point of the vector function\leavevmode\\\relax
\[\mathbf{r}(t) = e^{19 t}\cos t \,\mathbf i + e^{19 t}\sin t \,\mathbf j + e^{19 t} \,\mathbf k\]
\(\mathbf T(\pi/2) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{12.5ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{12.5ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{12.5ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par
